title: Acme Corp beats Q2 expectations, raises FY guidance
summary:
Acme Corp reported Q2 revenue up 12% y/y with EPS above consensus.
    Management raised full-year revenue and EPS guidance on broad-based demand.
    Gross margin expanded 120 bps on improved mix.

title: Zenith Retail misses on revenue, announces store closures
summary:
Zenith Retail's quarterly revenue missed expectations amid soft traffic.
    Company plans to close 80 underperforming stores and cut SG&A by 6%.
    Outlook maintained but at the low end of prior range.

title: NorthRiver declares 15% dividend hike after strong quarter
summary:
NorthRiver reported solid free cash flow and raised its quarterly dividend by 15%.
    Management reaffirmed capex discipline and expects stable margins.

title: Helios Tech launches $2B share buyback, margins expand
summary:
Helios Tech authorized a $2B repurchase program and posted better-than-expected gross margin
    on cost controls and pricing.

title: Marathon Foods guides down on higher input costs
summary:
Marathon Foods cut its FY guidance citing elevated commodity prices and FX headwinds.
    Company expects margin pressure to persist in H2.

title: Orion Software issues upbeat outlook on cloud transition
summary:
Subscription revenue grew 35% as Orion accelerates cloud migrations.
    Management issued upbeat outlook and sees improving net retention.

title: Vector Chips sees supply chain easing, raises capex for AI
summary:
Vector Chips noted improved foundry lead times and plans higher capex to support AI accelerators.
    Guidance maintained with upside bias.

title: Horizon Airlines returns to profitability; reinstates dividend
summary:
Horizon posted its first profitable quarter since 2022 amid robust travel demand.
    The company reinstated a modest dividend and guided to lower fuel costs.

title: BluePeak Health narrows loss as membership grows
summary:
BluePeak Health grew membership 10% and improved medical loss ratio.
    Management targets breakeven by year-end.

title: Stellar Bank boosts buyback after strong NIM; watching rates
summary:
Stellar Bank reported expanding net interest margin and increased its buyback authorization.
    Management remains cautious on rate cuts and credit quality.

title: Aquila Systems to acquire NovaSoft in $1.8B cash deal
summary:
Aquila announced an all-cash acquisition of NovaSoft to expand in DevOps tooling.
    Deal expected to close in Q4 pending regulatory approvals.

title: GreenGrid announces $750M convertible notes offering
summary:
GreenGrid launched a private offering of convertible senior notes due 2031
    to fund capacity expansion and general corporate purposes.

title: MetroMart to lay off 1,200 as it pivots to profitability
summary:
MetroMart will reduce headcount by ~8% as part of a restructuring aimed at improving unit economics.
    Management expects $120M in annualized savings.

title: Quanta Bio receives FDA clearance for diagnostic platform
summary:
Quanta Bio received 510(k) clearance for a rapid diagnostics platform.
    Launch expected in H2 with initial hospital partners on-board.

title: Orca Energy to acquire shale assets; issues equity to fund deal
summary:
Orca Energy agreed to purchase shale assets and plans a secondary offering to fund a portion.
    Management expects accretive production growth.

title: Nimbus Cloud unveils AI co-pilot; expands Azure partnership
summary:
Nimbus introduced an AI co-pilot for enterprise workflows and expanded a hyperscaler partnership.
    Early adopters report productivity gains.

title: Pioneer Motors announces plant closure; shifts to EV platform
summary:
Pioneer will close an older plant and reassign workers as it consolidates production around EV models.
    Company expects restructuring charges in Q3.

title: EverTrue receives DOJ second request in merger review
summary:
EverTrue's planned merger faces a DOJ second request focused on potential price effects.
    Companies remain committed to the transaction.

title: Lucent Fintech hit by data breach; launches remediation
summary:
Lucent disclosed a cyber incident affecting a vendor system.
    The company engaged forensics and is notifying impacted customers.

title: Summit Pharma settles patent litigation, updates guidance
summary:
Summit settled a patent lawsuit with a generic challenger.
    Management modestly raised full-year guidance on lower legal spend.

title: Atlas Logistics warns on Red Sea disruptions; raises surcharges
summary:
Atlas cited ongoing Red Sea shipping disruptions and implemented temporary surcharges.
    Management expects Q3 volume pressure but stable yield.

title: Citrine Apparel flags FX headwinds; hedging partly offsets
summary:
Citrine expects a 150 bps gross margin headwind from FX in H2.
    Hedging is expected to offset roughly half of the impact.

title: Harbor Tech guides cautiously on enterprise spending
summary:
Harbor cited elongated deal cycles and softer new logo activity.
    Management issued cautious guidance but noted improving pipeline quality.

title: NeoSteel raises capex to expand capacity amid strong orders
summary:
NeoSteel plans to increase capex to add capacity, citing robust order backlog.
    Company expects near-term free cash flow pressure.

title: Polar Airlines updates on fuel hedging; sees stable CASM
summary:
Polar highlighted favorable fuel hedges and expects unit costs to remain stable.
    Demand trends remain healthy across leisure routes.

title: Canyon Mining reduces guidance on commodity volatility
summary:
Canyon cut its production guidance reflecting commodity price volatility
    and maintenance downtime at a key site.

title: Prime Digital inks strategic partnership with MegaCloud
summary:
Prime Digital announced a multi-year partnership with MegaCloud to expand global reach.
    Joint go-to-market set to begin in Q4.

title: EverLend raises provisions; credit normalizing from lows
summary:
EverLend increased its loan loss provisions as credit trends normalize.
    Net charge-offs remain below historical averages.

title: Vista Homes files for IPO amid improving housing demand
summary:
Vista Homes confidentially filed for an IPO.
    Management cited supportive housing demand and lower mortgage rates.

title: Ionix Pharma discloses EMA request for additional data
summary:
Ionix received an EMA list of questions on its lead therapy.
    Company plans a Type II variation submission next quarter.
